# File lib/midilib/measure.rb, line 23
  def initialize(meas_no, start_time, duration, numer, denom, met_ticks)
     @measure_number = meas_no
     @start = start_time
     @end = start_time + duration - 1
     @numerator = numer     
     @denominator = denom
     @metronome_ticks = met_ticks
  end
